title: Intermediate Course on Collaborative Learning Design and Workflow Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Online Collaboration Tools and Foundational Knowledge in Social Sciences
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment in social sciences for working professionals, supporting flexible learning through personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can structure learning activity sequences of three or more stages using collaborative workflow design tools.
Learners can analyze and optimize collaborative learning processes by visualizing data flows between tools.
Learners can design a blended workflow—workshop-online discussion-artifact production—for social studies project topics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
